**Categorizing IT Ticket**

I'm focusing on the purchase-related language in the ticket text. "Document purchase order requisition" and "purchased requested" are strong indicators. This leans heavily towards the "Purchase" category. I will now look for any other clues to confirm this, but currently, "Purchase" seems most fitting.
